titleStmt.title: The Trojan horse of the Presbyteriall government vnbowelled wherein is contained, I. The power of the Presbyterian government, II. The persons in whom this power is placed, III. The exercise of the Presbyterian power in Scotland, and the lawes there imposed on the peoples necks.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Parker. Cf. DNB, McAlpin Coll.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
